languages.text: {n}Все служители культа — пустотнорожденные. Их гибкие, жилистые тела облачены в легкую броню, позволяющую быстро и виртуозно производить акробатические и фехтовальные выпады. Россыпь острых шипов и ритуальных украшений покрывает красно-черные одежды служителей. Там же, где от времени и тренировок прохудилась ткань, вы замечаете кровоточащие стигматы.{/n}

{n}The cultists are all voidborn. Their lithe, sinewy bodies are clad in light armour, which allows them to move with an acrobat's nimble grace and strike with an assassin's swift surety. Their red-and-black vestments are adorned with sharp spikes and ritual jewellery. Where time and training have worn their garments threadbare, you can make out patterns of bleeding lacerations.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Все служители культа — пустотнорожденные. Их гибкие, жилистые тела облачены в легкую броню, позволяющую быстро и виртуозно производить акробатические и фехтовальные выпады. Россыпь острых шипов и ритуальных украшений покрывает красно-черные одежды служителей. Там же, где от времени и тренировок прохудилась ткань, вы замечаете кровоточащие стигматы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cultists are all voidborn. Their lithe, sinewy bodies are clad in light armour, which allows them to move with an acrobat's nimble grace and strike with an assassin's swift surety. Their red and black vestments are adorned with sharp spikes and ritual jewellery. Where time and training have worn their garments threadbare, you can see patterns of bleeding lacerations.{/n}

{n}All of the cultists are voidborn. Their lithe, sinewy bodies are clad in light armour, allowing them to perform acrobatic feats and fencing lunges swiftly and masterfully. The cultists' red and black vestments are speckled with sharp spikes, ritual adornments, and exotic weapons. And where time and rigorous training have worn the fabric threadbare, you notice bleeding stigmata.{/n}

{n}The cultists are all voidborn. Their lithe, sinewy bodies are clad in light armour, which allows them to move with an acrobat's nimble grace and strike with an assassin's swift surety. Their red-and-black vestments are adorned with sharp spikes and ritual jewellery. Where time and training have worn their garments threadbare, you can make out patterns of bleeding lacerations.{/n}

{n}These cultists are voidborn. Their light armour offers minimal protection, but allows them to move with an acrobat's nimble grace and strike with an assassin's swift surety. They carry exotic weapons, and their lithe, sinewy bodies are clad in red and black vestments adorned with sharp spikes and ritual jewellery. Time and training have worn their garments threadbare, and their skin is covered in thin scars and bleeding lacerations.{/n}

Their red-and-black vestments are adorned with sharp spikes and ritual jewellery. Where time and training have worn their garments threadbare, you can make out patterns of bleeding lacerations.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les cultistes sont tous des hors-monde. Leurs corps souples et musclés sont revêtus d'une armure légère qui leur permet de se déplacer avec la grâce d'un acrobate et l'agilité d'un assassin. Leurs tenues rouge et noir sont ornées de pointes acérées et de bijoux rituels. Là où le temps et l'entraînement ont usé l'étoffe jusqu'à la corde, vous distinguez les entrelacs sanglants de scarifications rituelles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists are all voidborn. Their lithe, sinewy bodies are clad in light armour, which allows them to move with an acrobat's nimble grace and strike with an assassin's swift surety. Their red-and-black vestments are adorned with sharp spikes and ritual jewellery. Where time and training have worn their garments threadbare, you can make out patterns of bleeding lacerations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les cultistes sont tous des enfants du vide. Leurs corps souples et musclés sont revêtus d'une armure légère qui leur permet de se déplacer avec la grâce d'un acrobate et l'agilité d'un assassin. Leurs tenues rouge et noir sont ornées de pointes acérées et de bijoux rituels. Là où le temps et l'entraînement ont usé l'étoffe jusqu'à la corde, vous distinguez les entrelacs sanglants de scarifications rituelles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Todos los cultistas son nacidos en el vacío. Sus cuerpos esbeltos y fibrosos están protegidos por una armadura ligera que les permite moverse con la gracilidad de un acróbata y golpear con la presta certeza de un asesino. Sus vestimentas rojas y negras están decoradas con púas afiladas y joyas rituales. El tiempo y el entrenamiento han dejado su ropa hecha jirones, y a través de ella puedes entrever laceraciones sangrantes en su piel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists are all voidborn. Their lithe, sinewy bodies are clad in light armour, which allows them to move with an acrobat's nimble grace and strike with an assassin's swift surety. Their red-and-black vestments are adorned with sharp spikes and ritual jewellery. Where time and training have worn their garments threadbare, you can make out patterns of bleeding lacerations.{/n}

Sus cuerpos esbeltos y fibrosos están protegidos por una armadura ligera que les permite moverse con la gracilidad de un acróbata y golpear con la presta certeza de un asesino. El tiempo y el entrenamiento han dejado su ropa hecha jirones, y a través de ella puedes entrever laceraciones sangrantes en su piel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有拜死教教徒都是虚空之子。他们肌肉发达，身轻如燕，身披轻甲。他们的动作如同杂技演员般灵活优雅，出手如同刺客般迅捷果断。他们身穿红黑相间的教派制服，上面装饰着锋利的钉子与仪式珠宝。由于经受了漫长的训练，他们的制服已经破旧不堪，身上也布满了流血与撕裂的伤痕。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists are all voidborn. Their lithe, sinewy bodies are clad in light armour, which allows them to move with an acrobat's nimble grace and strike with an assassin's swift surety. Their red-and-black vestments are adorned with sharp spikes and ritual jewellery. Where time and training have worn their garments threadbare, you can make out patterns of bleeding lacerations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有拜死教教徒都是虚空之子。他们肌肉发达，身轻如燕，身披轻甲。他们的动作如同杂技演员般灵活优雅，出手如同刺客般迅捷果断。他们身穿红黑相间的教派制服，上面装饰着锋利的钉子与仪式珠宝。由于经受了漫长的训练，他们的制服已经破旧不堪，身上也布满了流血与撕裂的伤痕。{/n}

languages.text: {n}教団の信者は全員虚空生まれだ。軽装の鎧に包まれた引き締まった体は最低限の防護しか持たないが、アクロバットのように軽快に動き、暗殺者のように素早く確実に攻撃することができる。彼らは鋭いスパイクと儀式用の宝石で飾られた赤と黒の法衣に身を包んでいる。時間と鍛錬によって衣服は擦り切れ、出血性の裂傷による模様が見て取れることだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists are all voidborn. Their lithe, sinewy bodies are clad in light armour, which allows them to move with an acrobat's nimble grace and strike with an assassin's swift surety. Their red-and-black vestments are adorned with sharp spikes and ritual jewellery. Where time and training have worn their garments threadbare, you can make out patterns of bleeding lacerations.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Kultisten sind allesamt Kinder der Leere. Ihre sehnigen Körper und leichten Rüstungen erlauben ihnen, sich mit der eleganten Anmut eines Akrobaten zu bewegen und mit der blitzschnellen Präzision eines Assassinen zuzuschlagen. Ihre rot-schwarzen Gewänder sind mit scharfen Stacheln und rituellem Schmuck versehen. Die Zeit und ihre rigorose Ausbildung haben ihre Gewänder zerschlissen und du bemerkst zahlreichende blutende Wunden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists are all voidborn. Their lithe, sinewy bodies are clad in light armour, which allows them to move with an acrobat's nimble grace and strike with an assassin's swift surety. Their red-and-black vestments are adorned with sharp spikes and ritual jewellery. Where time and training have worn their garments threadbare, you can make out patterns of bleeding lacerations.{/n}

Ihre rot-schwarzen Gewänder sind mir scharfen Stacheln und rituellem Schmuck versehen. Die Zeit und ihre rigorose Ausbildung haben ihre Gewänder zerschlissen und du bemerkst zahlreichende blutende Wunden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tarikatçıların tümü de uçsuzdoğanlardan. Kıvrak ve zinde bedenleri hafif bir zırhla kaplı, bu yüzden akrobat misali atik bir zarafetle hareket edip suikastçılar kadar hızlı ve isabetli darbeler indirebiliyorlar. Kırmızı ve siyah renkli giysileri, keskin dikenler ve ayin mücevheratıyla bezenmiş. Giysilerin zamandan ve idmandan yıprandığı yerlerde kanamış yaraların izleri görülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists are all voidborn. Their lithe, sinewy bodies are clad in light armour, which allows them to move with an acrobat's nimble grace and strike with an assassin's swift surety. Their red-and-black vestments are adorned with sharp spikes and ritual jewellery. Where time and training have worn their garments threadbare, you can make out patterns of bleeding lacerations.{/n}
